org.apache.ambari.server.state.scheduler

Interface RequestExecution

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestExecutionImpl

    public interface RequestExecution
    Request Execution is a type of resource that supports scheduling a request or a group of requests for execution by the ActionManager.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  RequestExecution.Status
      Status of the Request execution
